sentences.en: A change in membrane potential affects the orientation of charged molecules.
sentences.cn: 模电位变化影响着荷电分子的方向.

sentences.en: An orientation of a complete graph is called a tournament.
sentences.cn: 完全图的定向图称为竞赛图.

sentences.en: Children need some orientation when they go to school.
sentences.cn: 小孩子上学时需要适应.

sentences.en: Farnese had the orientation of the church changed so that the front would face a square.
sentences.cn: 法尔内塞改变了教堂的朝向，这样它的正面就可以对着广场。

sentences.en: Grain orientation tends to be parallel to the coast.
sentences.cn: 颗粒的排列方向往往是平行于海岸.

sentences.en: How can we get students to adopt a serious orientation to learning?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样才能让学生对学习采取认真的态度呢？

sentences.en: Now we may discuss the effects of angular orientation upon physical laws.
sentences.cn: 现在我们来讨论角方位对物理定律的影响.

sentences.en: Orientation survey to establish the most suitable search techniques are recommended.
sentences.cn: 为确定恰当的普查方法,人们建议踏勘性普查.

sentences.en: Proper orientation of feeders and waterers promotes good performance.
sentences.cn: 饲槽和饮水器位置合适可以提高成绩.

sentences.en: Suddenly I was cartwheeling down the slope, all orientation gone.
sentences.cn: 突然，我骨碌碌地滚下坡，完全晕头转向了。

sentences.en: The company needs to develop a stronger orientation towards marketing its products.
sentences.cn: 公司需要针对其产品的营销设定一个更为明确的目标。

sentences.en: The course is essentially theoretical in orientation.
sentences.cn: 该课程的目标基本上是理论性的。

sentences.en: The most stable orientation of the molecular attraction lie along the surface.
sentences.cn: 分子最稳定的定向是在沿表面的分子吸引力最大处.

sentences.en: The party has a broadly socialist orientation.
sentences.cn: 该政党大体上倾向于社会主义。

sentences.en: The result would be the observed gradual change in fibril orientation.
sentences.cn: 结果形成所观察到的原纤取向的逐渐变化.

sentences.en: The traveller found his orientation with the aid of a good map.
sentences.cn: 旅行者借助一幅好地图得知自己的方向.

sentences.en: The winding trail caused the hikers to lose their orientation.
sentences.cn: 蜿蜒的小径使徒步旅行者迷失了方向.

sentences.en: The winding trail caused us to lose our orientation.
sentences.cn: 迂回曲折的小道使我们迷失了方向.

sentences.en: This is orientation week for all the new students.
sentences.cn: 这是让全体新生熟悉情况的迎新周。

words.tran_cn: 导向的；定向的；以…为方向的
调整；使朝向（orient的过去分词）；确定…的方位
使适应；确定方向；使朝东
方向；[测]定向；适应；情况介绍；向东方

phrases.tran_cn: 晶向；晶体方位；晶体定位；晶体学取向关系
顾客导向；以顾客为中心
纤维取向；纤维定向作用
晶粒取向；颗粒定向；纹理方向

trans.tran_cn: 方向，定位，取向，排列方向，任职培训，新生培训，（外交等的）方针[态度]的确定，环境判定
trans.tran_en: the type of activity or subject that a person or organization seems most interested in and gives most attention to
